title: Solidity Contract code help

body: Plus it doesn't look right here, why is some of it working and other parts not? I'm a really stuck noob.

Hey there! Unfortunately this is the Geth repo, we're just responsible for the networking and low level EVM layer for Ethereum. For programming in Solidity, you should either reach out to them https://github.com/ethereum/solidity, or Stack exchange: https://ethereum.stackexchange.com/.
